elements.name: panel1
elements.title: Describe the following terms that are important in connection with purchase costing and answer the final question.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Gross purchase price
elements.correctAnswer: Price charged by the producer for the product according to the price list or offer

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Net purchase price
elements.correctAnswer: Price that must actually be paid to the producer

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Purchase costs
elements.correctAnswer: All costs incurred for transportation, customs duties, postal taxes, insurance, etc.

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Cost price
elements.correctAnswer: Price that includes all costs of the goods and procurement

elements.name: question6
elements.title: How do you calculate the cost price of an item?
elements.correctAnswer: Gross purchase price - discount - cash discount + purchase costs = cost price
